main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Summerville, South Carolina on 3 April 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as 'colored caramel' and very shiny., It passed directly over a civilian woman's home with no noise., The object was observed traveling slowly about 150 feet above ground., Multiple witnesses, including children and Mr. Summerville, reported the sighting., The object was initially seen around 1530 hours and hovered while moving in a northerly direction.
witness description: a civilian woman, children in the neighborhood, and Mr. Summerville
